item.title: Are your classmates in your Klasse, Jahrgang, or Studienrichtung?
item.description: How do you say “class of 2020” in German? TLDR: you might get away with Jahrgang 2016, but that translation might not carry all the meaning you expect it toâ€”especially if you’re from the US. I can’t speak to the situation in other English-speaking countries, but at least in the US it is very common for students to think of themselves as belonging to a “class,” or cohort of students who began their studies in the same year.
